help.embedDescription: Below is a list of all commands associated with the bot:

move.description: Move songs around in the queue
move.usageReply: You must move a song not playing from one position in the queue to another.
move.result: <@{author}> moved **{title}** to position **{index}** in the queue.

nowplaying.description: Show what song is currently playing

play.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first.
play.errorNotInSameChannel: You must be in the same channel as {user}.
play.missingPermissionConnect: Cannot connect to voice channel due to missing permissions.
play.missingPermissionSpeak: Cannot speak in this voice channel due to missing permissions.
play.decreasedVolume: <@{author}> decreased the volume; the volume is now **{volume}%**.
play.increasedVolume: <@{author}> increased the volume; the volume is now **{volume}%**.
play.loopSong: <@{author}> looped the music. The loop is now **{loop}**.
play.songAccessErr: Video is age restricted, private or unavailable.
play.errorInvalidURL: Invalid URL. Please try a search or YouTube URL.

playlist.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first.
playlist.errorNotInSameChannel: You must be in the same channel as {user}.
playlist.missingPermissionConnect: Cannot connect to voice channel due to missing permissions.
playlist.missingPermissionSpeak: Cannot speak in this voice channel due to missing permissions.

queue.description: Show the song queue and what's currently playing
queue.missingPermissionMessage: Missing permission to manage messages or add reactions.

remove.description: Remove a song from the queue

search.description: Search and select videos to play
search.errorAlreadyCollector: A message collector is already active in this channel.
search.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first.
search.noResults: No results for the query; please try something else.

skipto.description: Skip to the selected queue number
skipto.usageReply: You must choose a song position from the queue you wish to skip to.
skipto.errorNotValid: The queue is only {length} song(s) long.

args.number: The queue position to skip to

uptime.description: Check the uptime of the bot

volume.description: Show the volume or change the volume
volume.volumeChange: The percent you want the volume to be
volume.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first.
volume.errorNotNumber: Please use a number to set the volume.
volume.result: The volume has been set to **{arg}%**.

common.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first.
common.cooldownMessage: Please wait **{time}** more second(s) before reusing the `{name}` command.
common.errorCommand: There was an error executing that command.
